mapper.update:
update t_hiddanger_supervise
hiddanger_id = #{hiddangerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
applyname = #{applyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
grade = #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
superviseorg = #{superviseorg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
listingtime = #{listingtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
governterm = #{governterm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
disannulterm = #{disannulterm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
capitalbudget = #{capitalbudget,jdbcType=INTEGER},
investedfunds = #{investedfunds,jdbcType=INTEGER},
termgovern = #{termgovern,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
lastupdatetime = #{lastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_hiddanger_supervise set hiddanger_id = #{hiddangerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, applyname = #{applyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grade = #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, superviseorg = #{superviseorg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, listingtime = #{listingtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, governterm = #{governterm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, disannulterm = #{disannulterm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, capitalbudget = #{capitalbudget,jdbcType=INTEGER}, investedfunds = #{investedfunds,jdbcType=INTEGER}, termgovern = #{termgovern,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_hiddanger_supervise set hiddanger_id = #{hiddangerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, applyname = #{applyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grade = #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, superviseorg = #{superviseorg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, listingtime = #{listingtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, governterm = #{governterm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, disannulterm = #{disannulterm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, capitalbudget = #{capitalbudget,jdbcType=INTEGER}, investedfunds = #{investedfunds,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(*) count from t_hiddanger_supervise hi left join item im on im.id=hi.grade where hi.hiddanger_id = #{condition.hiddanger_id=,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select hi.id,hi.hiddanger_id,hi.applyname,hi.grade,hi.superviseorg, hi.createtime,hi.lastupdatetime,hi.listingtime,hi.governterm,hi.disannulterm,hi.termgovern, hi.capitalbudget,hi.investedfunds,im.itemvalue as gradeName from t_hiddanger_supervise hi left join item im on im.id=hi.grade where hi.hiddanger_id = #{condition.hiddanger_id=,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
